name: Meteor Miner
description:
In Meteor Miner you play as a rocket that flies around space and runs into meteors in order to mine them. You use the money that you get from mining meteors to buy upgrades that help you mine more meteors and become more OP.

Be careful! There are numerous dangers in space. There are flaming meteors that will cause your fuel to ignite! There are also UFO's that will launch homing missiles at you.
